page.title: 18ANIMAL LOVERS
page.content: Iam 9 and my brother is 6.We attend Ashfield school.Our dad works for British Waterways Board and mum works in a boat builders office.We love animals and birds.We have 2 snow geese and 1 Chinese goose.One female has laid 92 eggs in 27 days.We have 2 Tumbler pigeons and 2 racing pigeons, 4 African Giuka ducks which are rare in Britain,2 Muscovey ducks ,1 Corky Cambell duck ,a cat and a chocolate Labrador. Dad is a part time taxidermist.I help .This is what we do:skin creature with skalpel,take out guts,mould plasticene with bones,put borax on skin,stitch together with cotton,dry fur with hair dryer.We have an otter and a Chinese chicken at school. We catch trout and eels in the Crinan canal and swim in the river.
